definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. Ju Jdg 19:9 (yet v. infr.); 3 fs. [[רָֽפִָתָה]] Ju Jdg 8:3, Je 49:24, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְפֶּה]] Is 5:24, [[וַיִּרֶף]] Ex 4:26 (v. infr.), etc.;—
sink down, of hay in flame Is 5:24; sink, decline, of day Ju Jdg 19:9 (si vera l.; LXXL Ke/KliKen, GFM [[נׇטָה]] [but how expl. the difficult [[רפה]]?]). Usu.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: ), of hands, c. [[מִן]] Ne 6:9 their hands will drop from the work (in fear); elsewh. abs. fig. = lose heart, energy, 2Sa 4:1, Is 13:7, Je 6:24, Je 50:43, Ez Eze 7:17, Eze 21:12, Zep 3:16; [[יׇרַיִם]] om. Je 49:24.
sink, relax, abate, of temper Ju Jdg 8:3 (+ [[מֵעַל]] pers.).
relax, withdraw, subj. ´[[י]]:, [[מִן]] pers. Ex 4:26 (J), i.e. let one alone (but rd. perh. [[וַיֶרֶף]], v.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[רִפָּה]] Job 12:21; Impf. 3 fpl. [[תְּרַפֶּינׇה]] Ez Eze 1:24, Eze 1:25; Pt. [[מְרַפֵּא]] (Ges:§ 75 rr) Je 38:4; pl. [[מְפִַּים]] Ezr 4:4;—causat.: let wings drop Ez Eze 1:24, Eze 1:25 (rd.

definitions.title: Qal,
definitions.body: [[כנפיהם]] subj., LXX Co Toy Krae al., who del. in v:Eze 1:25); loosen and let drop, girdle of mighty, fig. for weaken them Job 12:21; c. acc. hands, fig. for enfeeble, dishearten Je 38:4, Ezr 4:4.
let drop, the hand 2Sa 24:16 = 1Ch 21:15; fig., + [[מִן]] pers., = abandon, Jos 10:6 (JE); Perh. also ([[יָד]] om.) = relax, refrain Ex 4:26 (rdg. [[וַיֶרֶף]], v.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ); acc. rei, = abandon, forsake, Ne 6:3, so (subj. ´[[י]]:) Ps 138:8; subj. ´[[י]]:, c. acc. pers., De 4:31, De 31:6, De 31:8, Jos 1:5 (D), 1Ch 28:20.
let go, sf. pers., Ct So 3:4 (opp. [[אחז]]); fig., acc. (om.) [[מוּסָר]], Pr 4:13 (opp. [[החזיק]]), [[חְדָקָה]] Job 27:6 (opp. id.).

refrain, c. [[מִן]] pers., = let one alone Ju Jdg 11:37, De 9:14, [[מִן]] of anger Ps 37:8; c. [[ל]] pers. 1Sa 11:3, 2Ki 4:27; acc. pers. Job 7:19; abs. let alone, i.e. do nothing, be quiet, 1Sa 15:16, Ps 46:11 (cf. Weir in Dr:1Sa 15:16).—Je 3:22, Job 5:18, Ps 60:4 v. [[רָפָא]].

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[הִתְרַפִּיתָ]] Pr 24:10 hast shewn thyself slack; Pt. [[מִתְרַפֶּה]] Pr 18:9 one shewing himself slack, pl. [[מִתְרַפִּים]] Jos 18:3.—Vid. also [[רָפָא]] heal.
